thread.title: Great hotel in excellent location
thread.title_full: Great hotel in excellent location - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: espnlfc123
title: Great hotel in excellent location
text: I would recommend point a to anyone who wants to stay in a budget friendly, but overall solid hotel. Can't beat the price or location (Paddington station and underground)! The rooms, while smaller than some, do the job and you definitely get great value for your money.
